releaseNotes: FEAT: Add Convert Mardkdown to HTM context menu shortcut.
BUILD: Package functions to add and remove the shortcut.
FEAT: Set NoIcon and HideConsole as options.
NoIcon specifies that no shortcut icon should be set.
HideConsole specifies that the PowerShell console window should be hidden.
FIX: Fix overwritten output html does not show in warning.
BUILD: Change repository project site name.
